subject: Stuck Worker Requiring Cleanup
content:
MELO Build Recovery Status Update:

**SIGNIFICANT PROGRESS:** TypeScript compilation now PASSES (was completely broken). 15+ errors fixed, missing dependencies resolved. Build recovery ~80% complete.

**STUCK WORKER ISSUE:**
Session: c383860f-a81a-48c0-aa00-4a2c83c9ca5b (melo-web-push-build-fix)
Problem: Model 404 error - claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022 no longer available
Status: Worker cannot continue, consuming task slot

**REMAINING WORK:**
- Static page generation errors (runtime, not compile-time)
- Security vulnerability fixes
- Project completion audit

**REQUEST:** Please clean up stuck worker session so task slot can be reused. May need respawn with available model.

**CONTEXT:** Original '100% complete' claim was premature. Build validation revealed serious technical debt. Recovery showing strong progress but needs completion.
